Package sematic

Class Semantic

  • java.lang.Object
    • sematic.Semantic

  • public class Semantic
extends java.lang.Object
    This main class that controls the semantic analysis phase. Creates the symbol tables, performs type-checking and error reporting
    Author:
    krn-singh

      • phaseOne

        public void phaseOne​(AstNode node)
        Performs a depth first search of the AST. Creates the symbol tables and symbol table entries corresponding to the semantic actions of the visited node
        Parameters:
        node - current node of AST

      • phaseTwo

        public void phaseTwo​(AstNode node)
        Iterates through the AST and performs the type checking and other semantic checks.
        Parameters:
        node - current node of AST

      • circularClassDependencies

        public void circularClassDependencies​()
        Function checks for the circular class dependencies. It follows the concept that if the inherited class list of a symbol table in the inherited list of a class has the common class then there is circularity in the classes. (For example, A extends B, B extends C|A, then there is circularity)

      • printTable

        public void printTable​(SymTable table)
        Prints the symbol table
        Parameters:
